definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: collect, gather property, vb. only P (rare) (Mand. [[דכש]] gather, Norberg:Lexid.231; As. rukûšu, property (Hpt:Hbr iii. 110 riding anim.); Aram [[רִכְשָׁא]], rak4o0 = BH [[רֶכֶשׁ]]);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. ´[[ר]]:, acc. [[קִנְיׇן]], Ge 31:18 b, Ge 36:6; else where c.acc. cogn. [[רְכוּשׁ]]: [[אׇשֶׁר רָכָָשׁ]] Ge 31:18 a, 3 pl. [[רָֽכְשׁוּ]] Ge 46:6, [[דָכָָשׁוּ]] Ge 12:5.
